topic.title: EMS Past Medical History Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67842-5" EMS past medical history (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] title = "EMS Past Medical History"

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67793-0" Has the patient had any significant medical conditions (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component Contains zero or more [0..*] value with data type BL
If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 is "Refused " or "Unable to Complete," the value should be "NI"; the original value may be recorded in Observation.text. If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 is "None Reported," the value should be FALSE. If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 has proper values, the value should be TRUE.
This entry MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="68487-8" EMS History of Condition (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from
If NEMSIS EHistory.08 is "No bleeding disorder," the value should be the appropriate ICD-10 code (D66, D67, D68) and negationIndicator should be TRUE.
